townstead.configuration.title: %s Configuration
townstead.configuration.food_sources.too: Controls where villagers are allowed to get food.
townstead.configuration.food_sources.ena: Eat From Own Inventory
Allow villagers to eat food they are already carrying.
Pick Up Ground Food
Allow villagers to collect edible dropped items from the ground.
Use Containers
Allow villagers to take food from nearby inventories and item handlers.
Harvest Crops For Food
Allow villagers to harvest mature crops when looking for food.
Enable Farm Assist
Adds anti-trample and idle unstuck nudges for harvest chore villagers.
Enable Work Supply Automation
Allows chore restocking and harvest output storage from nearby containers. Disable to preserve baseline MCA chore behavior.
Store Harvest In Containers
Allow harvesting villagers to store gathered output in nearby containers.
Enable Farmer Stability V2
Adds anti-thrash guards, retries, and blocked states to farmer AI.
townstead.configuration.food_sources.far: Farmer Farm Radius
Max horizontal working radius around the farm anchor.
Farmer Cell Cooldown Ticks
How long before a villager can rework the same soil cell.
Farmer Pathfail Retries
Pathing retries per target before temporary blacklist.
Farmer Idle Backoff Ticks
How long villagers wait before reacquiring work after no valid target.
Farmer Seed Reserve
Minimum seeds to keep before expansion tilling is allowed.
Farmer Max Clusters
Maximum number of connected plot clusters in one farm area.
Farmer Max Plots
Maximum number of planned plot cells in one farm area.
townstead.configuration.food_sources.ena: Enable Farmer Water Placement
Allow farmers to place water sources in planned tiles when hydration is too low.
townstead.configuration.food_sources.far: Farmer Water Placements Per Day
Daily limit of water placements per farmer.
Farmer Hydration Minimum Percent
Minimum hydrated planned-plot coverage required before expansion tilling.
Farmer Water Source Search Radius
How far farmers may travel horizontally to refill water buckets.
Farmer Water Source Vertical Radius
Vertical water-source search range used for bucket refills.
Farmer Groom Radius
Radius around planned farm cells where farmers may clear removable weeds.
Farmer Groom Scan Interval Ticks
Ticks between farmer grooming target scans.
townstead.configuration.food_sources.ena: Enable Farmer Request Chat
Allow farmers to periodically ask for missing supplies in local chat.
townstead.configuration.food_sources.far: Farmer Request Interval Ticks
Minimum ticks between repeated farmer shortage requests.
townstead.configuration.food_sources.ena: Enable Cook Request Chat
Allow cooks to periodically announce missing kitchen supplies in local chat.
townstead.configuration.food_sources.coo: Minimum ticks between cook shortage request messages.
townstead.configuration.enableSelfInvent: Allow villagers to eat food they are already carrying.
townstead.configuration.enableGroundItem: Allow villagers to collect edible dropped items from the ground.
townstead.configuration.enableContainerS: Allow villagers to take food from nearby inventories and item handlers.
townstead.configuration.enableCropSourci: Allow villagers to harvest mature crops when looking for food.
townstead.configuration.enableFarmAssist: Adds anti-trample and idle unstuck nudges for harvest chore villagers.
townstead.configuration.enableWorkSupply: Allows chore restocking and harvest output storage from nearby containers. Disable to preserve baseline MCA chore behavior.
townstead.configuration.enableHarvestOut: Allow harvesting villagers to store gathered output in nearby containers.
townstead.configuration.enableFarmerStab: Adds anti-thrash guards, retries, and blocked states to farmer AI.
townstead.configuration.farmerFarmRadius: Max horizontal working radius around the farm anchor.
townstead.configuration.farmerCellCooldo: How long before a villager can rework the same soil cell.
townstead.configuration.farmerPathfailMa: Pathing retries per target before temporary blacklist.
townstead.configuration.farmerIdleBackof: How long villagers wait before reacquiring work after no valid target.
townstead.configuration.farmerSeedReserv: Minimum seeds to keep before expansion tilling is allowed.
townstead.configuration.farmerMaxCluster: Maximum number of connected plot clusters in one farm area.
townstead.configuration.farmerMaxPlots.t: Maximum number of planned plot cells in one farm area.
townstead.configuration.enableFarmerWate: Allow farmers to place water sources in planned tiles when hydration is too low.
townstead.configuration.farmerWaterPlace: Daily limit of water placements per farmer.
townstead.configuration.farmerHydrationM: Minimum hydrated planned-plot coverage required before expansion tilling.
townstead.configuration.farmerWaterSourc: How far farmers may travel horizontally to refill water buckets.
Vertical water-source search range used for bucket refills.
townstead.configuration.farmerGroomRadiu: Radius around planned farm cells where farmers may clear removable weeds.
townstead.configuration.farmerGroomScanI: Ticks between farmer grooming target scans.
townstead.configuration.enableFarmerRequ: Allow farmers to periodically ask for missing supplies in local chat.
townstead.configuration.farmerRequestInt: Minimum ticks between repeated farmer shortage requests.
townstead.configuration.enableCookReques: Allow cooks to periodically announce missing kitchen supplies in local chat.
townstead.configuration.cookRequestInter: Minimum ticks between cook shortage request messages.
townstead.configuration.debug.debugVilla: Show debug chat messages for villager AI (farmer, cook, etc.) to nearby players.
Show debug chat messages for villager AI (farmer, cook, etc.) to nearby players.
townstead.configuration.catalog.useTowns: Use the Townstead extended catalog with kitchen building tiers. Disable to use MCA's original catalog.
townstead.configuration.useTownsteadCata: Use the Townstead extended catalog with kitchen building tiers. Disable to use MCA's original catalog.
townstead.configuration.mood_audio.muteM: If enabled, MCA villager laugh/celebrate/cry sounds are muted on this client.
townstead.configuration.muteMoodVocaliza: If enabled, MCA villager laugh/celebrate/cry sounds are muted on this client.
townstead.configuration.caregiving.toolt: Controls how villagers feed babies and children.
townstead.configuration.caregiving.enabl: Allow adults to feed hungry babies, toddlers, and children.
Allow nearby non-parent villagers to feed young villagers when parents are absent.
townstead.configuration.enableFeedingYou: Allow adults to feed hungry babies, toddlers, and children.
townstead.configuration.enableNonParentC: Allow nearby non-parent villagers to feed young villagers when parents are absent.
townstead.configuration.shared_storage.t: Controls storage blocks villagers should avoid when sourcing food.
townstead.configuration.shared_storage.r: If enabled, villagers will not take food from protected storage blocks or tags.
townstead.configuration.shared_storage.p: List of block IDs villagers must not take food from.
List of block tags treated as protected food storage.
townstead.configuration.respectProtected: If enabled, villagers will not take food from protected storage blocks or tags.
townstead.configuration.protectedStorage: List of block IDs villagers must not take food from.
List of block tags treated as protected food storage.

townstead.blueprint.farming.title: Farming
townstead.blueprint.farming.tier.label: Tier
townstead.blueprint.upgradeBuilding.tool: Upgrade the building you are standing in to the highest available tier you currently satisfy.
townstead.farmer.tier.label: Farmer Tier: L%s
townstead.farmer.next_unlock.label: Next Unlock: %s XP
buildingType.compat/farmersdelight/kitch: A simple hearth kitchen with heat, one cooking station, and basic storage.
Adds a prep station for better ingredient handling.
A copper-equipped cookhouse built for steady daily production.
A professional stove kitchen with premium prep and upgraded storage.
An elite grand kitchen with multiple stoves, advanced prep, and nether-grade storage.
buildingType.compat.farmersdelight.kitch: A simple hearth kitchen with heat, one cooking station, and basic storage.
Adds a prep station for better ingredient handling.
A copper-equipped cookhouse built for steady daily production.
A professional stove kitchen with premium prep and upgraded storage.
An elite grand kitchen with multiple stoves, advanced prep, and nether-grade storage.
dialogue.chat.hunger.starving/1: I... I can barely stand. Please, do you have anything to eat?
dialogue.chat.hunger.starving/2: Everything's going dark around the edges... I need food, %1$s.
dialogue.chat.hunger.starving/3: I don't know how much longer I can go on like this without a meal...
dialogue.chat.hunger.starving/4: *clutches stomach* ...I'm sorry, I can't focus on anything right now.
dialogue.chat.hunger.starving/5: If I don't eat something soon, I'm going to collapse right here.
dialogue.chat.hunger.starving/7: I can't remember the last time I ate. My hands won't stop shaking.
dialogue.chat.hunger.starving/8: I'd give anything for even a piece of bread right now, %1$s.
dialogue.chat.hunger.famished/1: I haven't eaten in ages... do you have anything?
dialogue.chat.hunger.famished/3: I can't stop thinking about food right now...
dialogue.chat.hunger.famished/4: My stomach has been growling all day. I really need to find something to eat.
dialogue.chat.hunger.famished/5: I'd trade my best boots for a warm meal right about now.
dialogue.chat.hunger.famished/6: Have you seen any food around? I'm getting desperate, %1$s.
dialogue.chat.hunger.famished/7: Sorry if I seem distracted. It's hard to think about anything but food.
dialogue.chat.hunger.famished/8: I keep eyeing the crops in the fields... they can't grow fast enough.
dialogue.chat.hunger.hungry/1: I could really go for a bite to eat, honestly.
dialogue.chat.hunger.hungry/2: Is it lunchtime yet? My stomach seems to think so.
dialogue.chat.hunger.hungry/3: I've been meaning to grab something to eat. Just haven't gotten around to it.
dialogue.chat.hunger.hungry/4: Something smells good around here... or maybe I'm just hungry.
dialogue.chat.hunger.hungry/5: A nice stew would really hit the spot right about now.
dialogue.chat.hunger.hungry/6: I wonder what's for supper tonight? I'm getting a bit peckish.
dialogue.chat.farmer_progress.tier_up/1: I feel like I finally understand this land a little better.
dialogue.chat.farmer_progress.tier_up/2: These fields are starting to make sense to me now.
dialogue.chat.farmer_progress.tier_up/3: I've learned a better way to shape these plots.
dialogue.chat.farmer_progress.tier_up/4: My farming craft just took a step forward.
dialogue.chat.farmer_progress.tier_up/5: I can handle a more advanced farm plan now.
dialogue.chat.farmer_progress.tier_up/6: I've unlocked new farming ideas for our town.
